definitions.definition: A Christian house of worship; a building where Christian religious services take place.
definitions.example: There is a lovely little church in the valley.

definitions.definition: Christians collectively seen as a single spiritual community; Christianity.
definitions.example: These worshippers make up the Church of Christ.

definitions.definition: A local group of people who follow the same Christian religious beliefs, local or general.

definitions.example: The Church of England separated from the Roman Catholic Church in 1534.

definitions.definition: (as bare noun) Christian worship held at a church; service.
Organized religion in general or a specific religion considered as a political institution.
definitions.example: Many constitutions enshrine the separation of church and state.
She goes to a Wiccan church down the road.

definitions.definition: To conduct a religious service for (a woman after childbirth, or a newly married couple).
To educate someone religiously, as in in a church.
